Articles.Content: Hello everyone. I have been playing KSP for the past week and i quite enjoy it. I was searching for some good addons and downloaded a few. I have been trying to land on the mun, and i once almost made but crashed at the last second, so i checked for some addons which would help, then i came along mechjeb. I have tried to use the autopilot but each time, it would say that it has engaged but the rocket would always fly out of control . Can anyone explain how to properly use it?

Most if not all of the panels in MechJeb have a help button to explain how to use that feature. It's usually a Question mark.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I tried to launch again, after taking a look at the help for the ascent autopilot, and the launch ended in a failure once again. I seems as it if mechjeb is not providing any control inputs to correct the flight direction. I added a rcs fuel tank with 4 rcs thruster pods. I attached the mechjeb pod on to of the command pod, with a parachute on top. Is there something i am doing wrong?
as long as there isnt too much weight on one side of the craft. Try both SAS models
I have tried both the mechjebs with even a tiny stage with just a parachute, a fuel tank, a rcs fuel tank with 4 rcs pods, and it still pitches over to one side(i guess east) and drops to the ocean
